channel.title: Coffeescript on Jason Reeves
channel.description: Recent content in Coffeescript on Jason Reeves

item.title: Atom-Hugo Fixes
item.description: The Atom plugin that allows users to launch a Hugo server with live refresh. On every hugo server lanuch, three or four pages would open instead of the one. The hugo server would not shutdown on macOS when wanting to exit. I took this oportunity to fix the issue, as well as learn CoffeeScript to do it.
